categories: Category:Battles of the Invasion of Naboo

nodes.text: The Second Battle of Spinnaker was a retaliatory strike to recapture Spinnaker from the Trade Federation during the Invasion of Naboo. Forces led by Boss Rugor Nass attacked Camp 14 at Spinnaker, destroying a Trade Federation monument there and replacing it with a Gungan one, to serve as a rallying point for the Gungan forces.

The Second Battle of Spinnaker appears during the Gungan campaign in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds. The campaign was also included in the game's 2002 expansion pack, Clone Campaigns.
